contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Saint-André-de-Cubzac |image = Saint-André-de-Cubzac (Gironde) église 02.JPG |caption = Church of Saint-André |crest = Blason ville fr Saint-André-de-Cubzac (Gironde).svg |region = Aquitaine |department = Gironde |arrondissement = Bordeaux |canton = Saint-André-de-Cubzac |INSEE = 33366 |postal code = 33240 |mayor = Célia Monseigne |term = 2011–2014 |intercommunality = |longitude = -0.4447 |latitude = 44.9956 |elevation m = 30 |elevation min m = 2 |elevation max m = 73 |area km2 = 23.15 |population = 9323 |population date = 2009 }} '''Saint-André-de-Cubzac''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Gironde]] [[Departments of France|department]] in [[Aquitaine]] in south-western [[France]]. Its inhabitants are called Cubzaguais. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left | 1793 | 2800 | 1800 | 5279 | 1806 | 2828 | 1821 | 3087 | 1831 | 2957 | 1836 | 3329 | 1841 | 3010 | 1846 | 3327 | 1851 | 3389 | 1856 | 3432 | 1861 | 3690 | 1866 | 3611 | 1872 | 3505 | 1876 | 3543 | 1881 | 3540 | 1886 | 3737 | 1891 | 3884 | 1896 | 3916 | 1901 | 4091 | 1906 | 4023 | 1911 | 4019 | 1921 | 3924 | 1926 | 3974 | 1931 | 4054 | 1936 | 3641 | 1946 | 3459 | 1954 | 3945 | 1962 | 4238 | 1968 | 4572 | 1975 | 4984 | 1982 | 5243 | 1990 | 6341 | 1999 | 7235 | 2008 | 8977 }} {{clear-left}} ==Notable residents== [[Jacques-Yves Cousteau]] is buried in the Cousteau family plot. It is also the birthplace of [[Jean Marie Antoine de Lanessan]]. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Gironde department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== * http://www.saint-andre-de-cubzac.com/ * [http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=9889&pt=Jacques-Yves%20Cousteau Jacques-Yves Cousteau on Find A Grave] {{commons|Category:Saint-André-de-Cubzac|Saint-André-de-Cubzac}} {{Gironde communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Saintandredecubzac}} [[Category:Communes of Gironde]] {{Gironde-geo-stub}}
